rows.label: qst000201_msg0003
rows.name:
So if you need something, you'll
have to come back later, mo!

rows.label: qst000201_msg0004
rows.name:
Wait, do friends maybe
want to play with us, mo?

rows.label: qst000201_msg0005
rows.name: That never occurred to me, mo.

rows.label: qst000201_msg0006
rows.name:
If you insist, I guess
we can play with you!

rows.label: qst000201_msg0009
rows.name: Okay, I'll explain the rules, mo!

rows.label: qst000201_msg0010
rows.name:
The hiding area is just the
first floor of Goldmund, mo!

rows.label: qst000201_msg0011
rows.name:
If we start using the second
and third floors, we'll be
playing till sunset...

rows.label: qst000201_msg0012
rows.name: Then our moms will get mad, mo!

rows.label: qst000201_msg0013
rows.name:
Once you find everyone, we'll all
meet back here at Bower Lounge, mo!

rows.label: qst000201_msg0015
rows.name:
The search area isn't that big,
but we're not easy to find, mo.

rows.label: qst000201_msg0016
rows.name:
We'll show you the skills of kids
who play hide-and-seek every day!

rows.label: qst000201_msg0017
rows.name:
Okay, we're going to hide,
so count to a hundred then
you can start looking, mo!
